Articles.Content:
I'm having a problem with tweakscale... when I load a tweaked craft in space from the tracking station and sometimes loading from the launch pad or runway, the craft disintegrates. No explosions, it just flies apart. I figured this out by removing 1 mod at a time until the problem went away. Tweakscale is one of my favorite mods... please help!!!

KSP version.90 32bit

Tweakscale version 1.50

These are the other mods I was using with Tweakscale:

Mechjeb

Movie Time

Procedural Fairings

Impossible Inovations

Kerbal Foundries

Fuel Tanks Plus

BD Armory

Kerbal Joint re-enforcement

They are all up to date except BDarmory.

Output Log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rlg6qu2sm688scw/output_log.txt?dl=0

I hope someone can help me since Biotronic no longer supports this mod.

Edited February 12, 2015 by greydragon70
Hm, try without KJR? Although it's supposed to PREVENT stuff like that.

Hm, try without KJR? Although it's supposed to PREVENT stuff like that.

Yes I tried that. I loaded the Tweakscale into my Stock install and it still happened.
Sounds like a tweakscale specific problem if anything, so you should ask in the thread for it.

I sent Biotronic a pm but as I said in my post, Biotronic is no longer supporting Tweakscale. He said to post on the forums and ask for help. I did go back and post on that thread. Thought I'd post here too.

I had that same problem whenever I downloaded Infernal Robotics with Tweakscale. All my ships/satellites would rip themselves apart.

For the meantime, I'll have to do without robotic parts desperately in need of a more stock-like feel, anyways.
